price: 51. Tolkayow! idinkuma weydiisanayo wax abaalgud ah (Dhambaalkan), abaal gudkeyga wuxuu saaran yahay oo keliya Kan i abuuray (Alle). Ee ma waydaan haddaba wax fahmeyn?
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ لَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَجۡرًاۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِيٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi lā asalukum ʿalayhi ajran in ajriya illā ʿalā alladhī faṭaranī afalā taʿqilūna
